summary: MY 2015 AUDI S5 IS GETTING FAULTS ON THE STEERING AFTER DRIVING IN THE RAIN ONE NIGHT WHILE DRIVING A RED LIGHT TURN ON AND HAD LOSE ALL POWER STEERING AND WAS NEARLY UN-DRIVABLE.   DESCRIPTION NHTSA RECALL NUMBER  THE AFFECTED VEHICLES HAVE ELECTRIC POWER STEERING ASSIST SYSTEMS THAT  MAY SHUT DOWN AS A RESULT OF A STEERING MOTOR SENSOR FAULT (WHICH  COULD ONLY OCCUR WITH VERY COLD AMBIENT TEMPERATURES). IF THE VEHICLE  EXPERIENCES A LOSS OF POWER STEERING ASSIST, EXTRA STEERING EFFORT WILL  BE REQUIRED AT LOWER SPEEDS, INCREASING THE RISK OF A VEHICLE CRASH.    15V452
